data.name: AttachmentInformationRequired
data.value: The Attachment Information is required.

data.value: Please provide the Attachment Title.

data.value: bounds is a required property for FormField and cannot be null

data.name: FieldTypeRequired
data.value: fieldType is a required property for FormField and cannot be null

data.name: BothFileParamUsed
data.value: Conflicting file information detected. Please use either the 'Files' option to send a file or the 'FileUrls' option to give a file link. Using both options at the same time is not possible.

data.name: MissingFileInput
data.value: File input missing. To proceed, please upload a file using the 'Files' property or provide a URL for the file using the 'FileUrls' property.

data.name: NoSignerFormFieldsWhenNoFile
data.value: Signer cannot have 'FormFields' if no file has been uploaded. Please upload a file before adding 'FormFields' for the Signer

data.name: NoRoleFormFieldsWhenNoFile
data.value: Role cannot have 'FormFields' if no file has been uploaded. Please upload a file before adding 'FormFields' for the Role

data.name: FilesizesWithin100MB

data.value: The File type for attachment required.

data.name: ImageFormatRequired

data.name: InvalidFormat
data.value: The given format is not valid.

data.name: TextTagValueNotSupported
data.value: The Value property is supported for text tag definitions only for text boxes, labels, drop-downs, hyperlinks, checkboxes, radio buttons, images, and editable date fields.

data.name: ExpiryDaysValOutOfRange
data.value: Provided expiry days should be within the range 1 - 180

data.name: ExpiryHoursValOutOfRange
data.value: Provided expiry hours should be within the range 8 - 4320

data.name: ExpirySpecifcDateOutOfRange
data.value: Exact date and time given for document expiry should be between 1 to 180 days

data.name: InvalidTextTagSize
data.value: Invalid field size. Field height and width should be greater then 0.

data.name: LanguageRequired
data.value: Any one of the given language is required.

data.name: MessageLengthExceeds
data.value: The message exceeds the limit of 5000 characters

data.name: NewSignerEmailAddressRequired

data.value: Old signer email is required for changing the recipient details
